enhanced_description: HONO, founded in 2008, offers an intelligent Human Capital Management (HCM) platform designed to simplify and humanize end-to-end HR processes. Their 'Hire to Retain Solution' comprehensively covers the entire workforce lifecycle, from pre-hire to post-tenure, aiming to optimize business outcomes for team managers, simplify complex HR tasks for HR professionals, and help employees achieve work-life balance. The platform features intelligent HRMS software leveraging complex data science algorithms to provide real-time, actionable insights for employee wellbeing and organizational growth. HONO emphasizes enterprise-grade security and maintains a single source of truth for all HR data, supporting organizations in driving positive change and future-proofing their workforce. It also includes dedicated tools for enhancing employee engagement and experience.
